sent.orig: Bullshit, you oneself also saw, they to disembark occasionally! They also to disembark occasionally!
sent.trans: 胡说，您自己也看见了，它们有时候也上岸！

sent.orig: About me, very ordinary, likes occasionally making noise, occasionally is peaceful.
sent.trans: 关于我，非常平凡，偶尔地弄出声响的喜欢，偶尔地是平安的。

sent.orig: Photographers occasionally use it as an apocalyptic backdrop.
sent.trans: 倒是摄影师偶尔会把这里当作世界末日的背景。

sent.orig: The developers fixed a bunch of small bugs which some users occasionally ran into.
sent.trans: 官方更新一些小错误，一些用户有时会碰到。

sent.orig: Occasionally, lymph nodes can be found in the vicinity of the umbilicus.
sent.trans: 偶而，脐周淋巴结可触及。
